# init(bitPattern:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new value with the given bit pattern.

## Declaration

```swift
init(bitPattern: UInt16)
```

## Parameters

- **bitPattern**: The integer encoding of a `Float16` instance.

## Discussion

The value passed as `bitPattern` is interpreted in the binary interchange format defined by the [http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/servlet/opac?punumber=4610933].
title: init(bitPattern:)
